paragraphs.content: But when they looked, they saw that the stone was rolled away, (for it was very great,) and two angels sitting thereon, clothed in long white garments; and they were affrighted.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But when they looked, they saw that the stone was rolled away, (for it was very great,) and two angels sitting thereon, clothed in long white garments; and they were affrighted.

paragraphs.content: But the angels said unto them, Be not affrighted; ye seek Jesus of Nazareth, who was crucified; he is risen; he is not here; behold the place where they laid him;
paragraphs.contentHtml: But the angels said unto them, Be not affrighted; ye seek Jesus of Nazareth, who was crucified; he is risen; he is not here; behold the place where they laid him;

paragraphs.content: And go your way, tell his disciples and Peter, that he goeth before you into Galilee; there shall ye see him as he said unto you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And go your way, tell his disciples and Peter, that he goeth before you into Galilee; there shall ye see him as he said unto you.

paragraphs.content: And they, entering into the sepulcher, saw the place where they laid Jesus.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And they, entering into the sepulcher, saw the place where they laid Jesus.
